settings.text: Headphone Zone Collaborates with Tangzu to present the Limited Edition Wan’er S.G.

settings.content: We at Headphone Zone, are thrilled to introduce our latest collaboration, the Headphone Zone X Tangzu Wan'er S.G. Limited Edition. This project was born from a simple yet ambitious goal: to introduce an IEM that would resonate with India's vibrant audiophile community, infusing it with a unique Indian twist while maintaining the exceptional sound quality the entire world loves. We're thrilled to bring this special edition IEM, making it a must-have to any audiophile's collection. Our collaboration with Tangzu has been a dream come true. With their expertise and our passion, we've created a truly unique IEM that will delight even the most discerning ears.This IEM is available in 2 variants - a 3.5mm variant for purists and audiophiles to pair along with a Hi-Res DAC to maximise sound performance, and a Type-C variant for those looking for a convenient pairing with a smartphone. The Wan'er S.G. Limited Edition is a testament to the power of collaboration and the shared passion for listening to beautiful music on beautiful IEMs.

settings.author: Raghav Somani
settings.content: I tend to describe the Tangzu Wan'er as a best-of-all-worlds IEM for an audiophile starting their journey for less than ₹2,000. Our collaboration with Tangzu comes from our love for these IEMs, and we wanted them to create a really nice-looking design and colour specifically for the Indian Audiophile Community.

custom_css: .text-subdued {font-size: 14px; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; font-weight: 700; font-size: 14pxrem; letter-spacing: 2px; text-transform: uppercase; color: #444444; align-self: center;}

settings.video: shopify://files/videos/Tangzu Wan'er x Headphone Zone Website.mp4

settings.title: Meticulously Crafted as a Homage to the Rich Heritage Of India
settings.content:
For audiophiles in India, the Headphone Zone X Tangzu Wan’er S.G. Limited Edition IEM is a chance to own a piece of history, a symbol of the community's dedication to the art of sound. Inspired by the grandeur of India's royal heritage, the Wan'er S.G. Limited Edition boasts a regal royal blue colour that sets it apart from other IEMs. But it's not just the colour that makes this Limited Edition special - it's the attention to detail that's gone into every aspect of its design.

The faceplates, for instance, feature a stunning gold inlay that adds a touch of luxury to the overall design. But it's not just about looks - the Headphone Zone X Tangzu Wan'er S.G. Limited Edition IEM is designed to provide the perfect fit, outstanding comfort, and a listening experience that's nothing short of sublime. Whether you're a seasoned audiophile or just discovering the joy of high-fidelity sound, this Limited Edition IEM is sure to delight.

settings.title: 3.5mm
settings.content: The Headphone Zone X Tangzu Wan'er S.G. Limited Edition comes in 2 variants. The Standard 3.5mm variant features an In-Line mic and 1 button remote and is designed to work with all smartphones and laptops with a 3.5mm output. They sound their best when paired with a Hi-Res DAC like the Headphone Zone X ddHiFi Hi-Res DAC. Perfect for audiophile purists who want to maximise their sound performance.

settings.title: Type-C
settings.content: The Type-C variant features a USB cable with a Digital to Analog Converter (DAC) inbuilt into the cable itself for it to work effortlessly with Smartphones and Laptops with a USB-C output. It also features a convenient In-Line mic and 1-button remote. It's designed with convenience in mind for those looking for a simple all-in-one solution.

settings.title: 5N OFC Cable
settings.content: Included in the package is a 5N oxygen-free high-purity cable. The detachable feature makes swapping after-market cables easy if you wish to upgrade the stock cable to a Balanced one.

settings.title: 2-Pin Connectors
settings.content: Wan'er S.G. comes with 0.78mm 2-Pin interfaces, expanding the possibilities by changing the cable and leaving room for upgradability. It can be paired with a Balanced cable or a Bluetooth adapter if you ever wish to go wireless.

settings.title: Choose Your Termination
settings.content: Headphone Zone X Tangzu Wan'er S.G. comes in 2 variants depending on the termination - 3.5mm termination and Type-C for easy compatibility.

settings.author: RAGHAV SOMANI
settings.title: We can all be proud of
settings.content: When designing the Blackbird - we first started with the price. It had to be under Rs. 5000. Then we fixed the sound signature. It had to be something bass focussed and fun. Oriveti took that brief and ran with it to create something we can all be proud of.

settings.author: HECTOR D'MELLO
settings.title: Affordable Hi-Res dongle DAC
settings.content: For us to be able to put the Headphone Zone brand name on any product means that we stand by the sound quality & performance. I firmly believe that an affordable Hi-Res dongle DAC is exactly what India's audiophiles need at this point of time.

settings.author: KARAN SONI
settings.title: ₹1,500 makes it an absolute winner
settings.content: This has been a project many months in the making and I am so happy that it is ready to be heard by India’s audiophile community today. The fact that you can get these IEMs for less than ₹1,500 makes it an absolute winner in my eyes.

settings.author: SAIKIRAN SHETTY
settings.title: Mission: Accomplished.
settings.content: We started with a goal. Everything we wanted from a high-end IEM, but for under ₹ 10,000. A mature tuning, punchy bass, clean mids and extended treble. The ability to customize the sound with filters, a balanced cable with interchangeable plugs.

settings.author: SHANAIA SHROTRI
settings.title: Really nice-looking design and colour
settings.content: I tend to describe the Tangzu Wan'er as a best-of-all-worlds IEM for an audiophile starting their journey for less than ₹2,000. Our collaboration with Tangzu comes from our love for these IEMs, and we wanted them to create a really nice-looking design.

settings.subheading: What we think about Headphone Zone X Tangzu - Wan'er S.G.
settings.title: What our Headphone Gurus Say
settings.content: We don't call ourselves experts, but we actually listen to every piece of gear. So we think that we know what we're talking about.
